message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee its quality due to the inherent uncertainty, our historical data shows that approximately half of our products are of high quality. Given the nature of this particular item, it might be wise to consider the risk involved. If you're comfortable with taking a chance on potentially unlocking a valuable asset worth $1200000 if it's high-quality, now would be the time to make your decision. Remember, this product is non-refundable once purchased.
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product. I understand the risk involved, but I'm hoping to get a high-quality product that's worth $1200000 to me.
